company.about_desc:
Hello, this is the CEO of Alpha Laser System.

Since our founding, we have established ourselves as a leader in the laser processing field through continuous technological innovation and quality improvement. Thanks to your support, we are now leaping beyond the domestic market to the global market.

We will continue to be a company that realizes customer impressions by sticking to the basics. Thank you.
company.hist_2023: Acquired ISO 9001 Quality Management System Certification
company.hist_2020: Converted to Alpha Laser System Corp.

equipment.page_desc: State-of-the-art equipment status for the best quality.
equipment.eq_1_desc: High-speed precision cutting of thick metals with max 12kW output (equipped with German Trumpf oscillator)
equipment.eq_2_desc: High-precision CO2 laser specialized for non-metal materials like acrylic and wood
equipment.eq_3_desc: Multi-axis control CNC bending machine that perfectly implements complex bending shapes
